de.mrapp.android.util.view

Class ScrimInsetsLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • FrameLayout
      • de.mrapp.android.util.view.ScrimInsetsLayout

  • public class ScrimInsetsLayout
extends FrameLayout
    A layout, which allows to show a drawable in the insets, which are passed to its fitSystemWindows(Rect) method. This area usually corresponds to the device's status or navigation bar.
    Since:
    1.4.6

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ScrimInsetsLayout.Callback
      Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified, when the insets, which are passed to the layout's fitSystemWindows(Rect) method, have been changed, must implement.

      • ScrimInsetsLayout

        public ScrimInsetsLayout(@NonNull
                         Context context,
                         @Nullable
                         AttributeSet attributeSet)
        Creates a new layout, which allows to show a drawable in the insets, which are passed to its fitSystemWindows(Rect) method.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained

      • ScrimInsetsLayout

        public ScrimInsetsLayout(@NonNull
                         Context context,
                         @Nullable
                         AttributeSet attributeSet,
                         @AttrRes
                         int defaultStyle)
        Creates a new layout, which allows to show a drawable in the insets, which are passed to its fitSystemWindows(Rect) method.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource

      • ScrimInsetsLayout

        public ScrimInsetsLayout(@NonNull
                         Context context,
                         @Nullable
                         AttributeSet attributeSet,
                         @AttrRes
                         int defaultStyle,
                         @StyleRes
                         int defaultStyleResource)
        Creates a new layout, which allows to show a drawable in the insets, which are passed to its fitSystemWindows(Rect) method.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used by the view, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        attributeSet - The attribute set, the view's attributes should be obtained from, as an instance of the type AttributeSet or null, if no attributes should be obtained
        defaultStyle - The default style to apply to this view. If 0, no style will be applied (beyond what is included in the theme). This may either be an attribute resource, whose value will be retrieved from the current theme, or an explicit style resource
        defaultStyleResource - A resource identifier of a style resource that supplies default values for the view, used only if the default style is 0 or can not be found in the theme. Can be 0 to not look for defaults
